definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: Back in America, she became a recluse and wrote a splendid memoir
sentences.chinese: 回到美國後，她開始漸漸退出演藝圈，轉而寫回憶錄。

sentences.english: Malraux's Anti-Memoirs consists of double structures of overtness and covertness.
sentences.chinese: 《反回憶錄》由顯性和隱性的“雙重結構”組成。

sentences.english: She amassed her papers for her memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 她把文件彙集起來準備寫回憶錄。

sentences.english: MANY politicians use their memoirs to settle old scores.
sentences.chinese: 衆多政治家都在他們的回憶錄裏算舊賬揭老底。

sentences.english: Besides histories, we have many volumes of reminiscences, and biograph ies with number.
sentences.chinese: 除了歷史書籍外，我們還有不計其數的回憶錄和傳記。
她的回憶錄是由別人代寫的。

sentences.english: Other oddities leak out from the books and the memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些奇聞逸事從書本和回憶錄中泄露出來。

sentences.english: The author has deep feelings after reading Shenguoqiang's memoir.
sentences.chinese: 作者在閱讀完沈國強先生回憶錄之後，深有所感。

sentences.english: Dunant later wrote a book called "A Memory of Solferino."
sentences.chinese: 杜南隨後寫了一本書“索爾費裏諾回憶錄”。

sentences.english: He said he would continue working on a second volume of memoirs, to be called The Final Strategic Counteroffensive.
sentences.chinese: 他說將繼續寫作回憶錄的第二卷《最後的戰略反攻》。

sentences.english: The old man kept writing his memoirs till the day he crossed over.
sentences.chinese: 老人一直在不停地寫他的回憶錄，直到他死的那一天。

sentences.english: These memories are, in fact, an attempt on his part to build up his own image.
sentences.chinese: 這本所謂回憶錄實際上是爲他自己樹碑立傳。

sentences.english: This is a reminiscences on the investigation of the loess Plateau.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇考察黃土高原的回憶錄。

sentences.english: In the memoir, he did not hide his hatred toward the Chinese Communists.
sentences.chinese: 在回憶錄裏，他並不掩飾對中共的憎惡。

sentences.english: There are too many memoirs selling nowadays.
sentences.chinese: 現在有太多自誇自賣的回憶錄，我並不喜歡讀。

sentences.english: The publishing-house paid a fat price for the former First Lady's memoirs.
sentences.chinese: 這家出版社爲出版前總統夫人回憶錄而出了高價。

definition: Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
name of a book/reputation as calligrapher

pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 Wen2 xue2 Jiang3
